alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:14PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ellis County through 845 PM CDT... At 813 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ennis and another near Maypearl, both moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waxahachie, Ennis, Palmer, Italy, Maypearl, Bardwell, Alma, Bardwell Lake, Garrett, Milford, Mertens, Reagor Springs, Ike, Telico, Avalon, Forreston, Crisp, Howard, Five Points and Boyce. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 379 and 402. Interstate 45 between mile markers 244 and 261. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
